summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PDF Premium Design upgrade and Project Finance Detail Receipts section. Backend: 21/21 tests passed. Frontend: All features working - PDF generation with clean typography (no ALL CAPS), Receipts section on Project Finance Detail page with View/Download functionality.
passed_tests: PDF uses company settings (company_name, authorized_signatory, primary_color)
PDF has clean premium design with proper typography (no ALL CAPS)
PDF shows: Receipt Number, Date, Customer Name, Project ID, Payment Description, Amount, Mode, Account, Balance
PDF has 'This is a system-generated receipt' footer
Company settings endpoint returns all required fields
Receipts section columns: Receipt #, Date, Amount, Mode, Account, Actions
Receipt view dialog shows all details including Contract Value, Total Received, Balance Remaining
Project Finance Detail endpoint returns summary with total_received
View receipt dialog works from Project Finance Detail page
Download PDF works from Project Finance Detail page (both from dialog and list)
PDF download shows success toast message
Receipts list shows Total Received at bottom
